text:
Ginetta.net | Frontend-Engineer, Javascript, CSS | Zurich, Switzerland | Salary: 90k-100k CHF | ONSITE

Ginetta is one of the most popular UX / web agencies in Zurich and we are looking for two frontend roles at the moment: The one is more focused on modular CSS and HTML5 and the other is more focused on Javascript.

Our hiring process:

1) Resume / code-check

2) Small coding assigmnet (2 - 4 hours)

2) Phone call (getting to know each other, technical interview)

3) Onsite (half a day)

Send a mail with a short intro about yourself (video or written) OR a Github-link OR a resume to:

hiring+hn@ginetta.tech
